jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Sky is one of Europe‚Äôs leading media and entertainment companies, and a part of Comcast Corporation, which also owns NBCUniversal (NBCU). We create award-winning original content, produce the biggest live sporting events and provide free access to news and the arts.

We work on the Global Streaming Platform supporting various video on demand products such as Sky Showtime, Peacock and Showmax.

Sky tech hub in Prague consists of around 100 people and it will be growing in the future. These are mostly developers, video-streaming enthusiasts and experts, with extensive experience across markets, technology, and products working on the Global Streaming Platform. We are collaborating closely with our colleagues in the UK, Portugal and the US.

What role will you play?

You will be part of a team focused on the player experience, but you will also be part of the entire iOS community within the company. The team includes Android and iOS developers and dedicated QAs.

You will be part of a dynamic team developing client applications and making sure our technology delivers the best experience for our customers.

What you'll do:
‚Ä¢ Craft high-quality software utilizing agile methodologies
‚Ä¢ Design clean, efficient, and reliable code
‚Ä¢ Deliver highly scalable and extremely reliable products (our customers demand 99.999% availability)
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with fellow developers, exchanging knowledge and insights - prepare to learn a lot!
‚Ä¢ Passionately introduce top-notch technology and software development practices into the team
‚Ä¢ Participate in the entire development cycle, from analysis and implementation to testing and operation
‚Ä¢ Embrace operational excellence and support as integral aspects of the development team's responsibilities

What skills do you need to play your role well?
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in native iOS/tvOS languages, specifically Swift
‚Ä¢ Strong iOS/tvOS development background
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Design Patterns and Object-Oriented Design principles
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive knowledge of key iOS/tvOS architectural components, including Model-View-Controller (MVC), Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM), and Coordinator patterns
‚Ä¢ Experience working with RESTful APIs
‚Ä¢ Practical knowledge of network protocols, along with an understanding of latency and reliability challenges
‚Ä¢ Demonstrated experience with multithreading, request queuing, and caching in code
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Continuous Integration/Deployment tools and processes
‚Ä¢ Excellent teamwork, self-motivation, and eagerness to learn
‚Ä¢ Creative thinking, strong analytical skills, and attention to detail
‚Ä¢ Fluency in English

What can you expect in return?
‚Ä¢ Working in an international environment on an impactful globally scaled technology in cross-functional team with an agile approach
‚Ä¢ Open and healthy working culture where we care about people as much as about stability of the code
‚Ä¢ Work equipment as per your specifications
‚Ä¢ Annual bonus based on your performance
‚Ä¢ Hybrid work, combining working from our office to be closer to the team and working from home
‚Ä¢ Work life balance thanks to flexible working hours
‚Ä¢ Generous free day scheme providing 25 days of holidays + 5 days of on-demand leave (sick days)
‚Ä¢ Contribution to Multisport Card or Benefit Card
‚Ä¢ Meal Allowance
‚Ä¢ Team building activities

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
iOS Developer

Join us and help us develop meaningful and globally successful mobile apps.

Do you love programming? Would you like to participate in the development process of globally successful mobile apps? Now is your chance! Join our TappyTaps team and help us develop meaningful apps. üëç
Why join TappyTaps?

We are a well established IT company in Ho≈ôice v Podkrkono≈°√≠, creating mobile and desktop apps with a global reach.

We don't do any contract development; we create our own apps that we believe in. We do everything in-house, from the initial idea, through wireframes and design to the actual development and marketing.

We have been operating in the mobile app market for the past 12 years. Our most popular apps (Bibino, Barkio, Baby Monitor 3G) have been loved by millions of customers from the United States, Europe and Australia. Our apps are regularly featured in both App Store and Google Play and rank in the top charts in many countries.
What do you need to enjoy working with us?
‚Ä¢ you know Swift at a very good level
‚Ä¢ you speak English at B1 level (at least)
‚Ä¢ you are interested in programming and developing your skills (both in and outside of work)
‚Ä¢ you live for the latest technologies and mobile applications
‚Ä¢ experience in a similar position is not necessary; your work ethic and desire to learn are more important to use
What can you expect?
‚Ä¢ 5 experienced developers who will welcome you into the team with open arms
‚Ä¢ developing new apps and improving existing ones
‚Ä¢ morning stand-ups, three-week sprints and, most importantly, visible results of working together
‚Ä¢ opportunity to participate in the development of globally successful applications

The work in TappyTaps is very diverse. We have customers from all over the globe, and we are constantly trying to improve our apps to make them truly helpful to our users. We value ideas, and when they make sense for our users as well, we are happy to implement them.
What do you get from working with us?
‚Ä¢ opportunity to participate in the development process of mobile apps with a global reach
‚Ä¢ chance to improve your programming skills and learn from experienced developers
‚Ä¢ 4-day work week üòâ
‚Ä¢ chance to work with the latest technologies
‚Ä¢ full-time job with career growth opportunities
‚Ä¢ job in a stable and thriving company
‚Ä¢ MacBook Pro
‚Ä¢ unlimited access to quality coffee and tea
‚Ä¢ great team
What is the TappyTaps team like?

We are a team of friendly developers, graphic designers, web developers and support staff. We don't use clock cards, and we are not fans of a strict 30-minute lunch break. From time to time, we organize a team event. In the past, we participated in a first aid course, an escape game or did canoeing. üõ∂ The main benchmark for us is the work we get done. We really enjoy what we do, and we'd love it if you enjoyed it too.

Our offices are about a 5-minute walk from the bus station and about 15 minutes from the train station. You can also park conveniently (for free) right on the premises.

jobs_results.title: Latam IOS / Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
Why Praxent?

We get it. You have options. Let us tell you why we‚Äôre different. Our work is changing the world of financial services. Everyday, clients arrive with big ideas for their industry. They‚Äôre experts in their field with the vision and resources you need to change everything. All that‚Äôs left is the right team to bring that vision to life. If you‚Äôre a fast learner and you love working on a wide variety of projects, you‚Äôre going to like it here. We help our clients modernize, rather than rebuild, outdated customer-facing software applications. Our clients see a return within weeks instead of months and that‚Äôs why they choose us.

At Praxent, we let you do your work your way. We‚Äôre a team of 120+ located throughout the United States and Central/South America. Our role is to encourage you, support you, and give you the freedom you need to thrive. Whether you‚Äôre working at home, in a coffee shop, or heck, even on your travels, we‚Äôre here to create an environment that lets you live your best life. On your terms.

We trust our people to be their best. It‚Äôs a level of autonomy and respect that‚Äôs helped us grow a diverse and brilliant team of experts. Experts who also happen to be some of the best colleagues you‚Äôve ever worked alongside.

This role has been categorized as a Remote position. ‚ÄúRemote‚Äù employees do not have a permanent corporate office workplace and, instead, work from a physical location of their choice which must be identified to the Company. Employees may live in the following locations: Mexico, Guatemala, El Salvador, Costa Rica, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Brazil, Argentina.

We'd Love To Hear From You If
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs degree in related discipline or 2-4 years of relevant experience
‚Ä¢ 4+ years experience in software engineering
‚Ä¢ 2+ years experience in Swift, Objective-C, Java, Kotlin
‚Ä¢ 2+ experience in iOS and Android development required
‚Ä¢ Experience developing high-quality mobile applications
‚Ä¢ Strong UI/UX design understanding
‚Ä¢ Previous agency experience and experience working in software teams with Agile, Scrum, and Kanban methodologies preferred.

What You‚Äôll Love About Us:
‚Ä¢ Stability. We've been in business for over 20 years.
‚Ä¢ Work stays at work. We promote a healthy work/life balance to help ensure you have the time that you need. We encourage no more than a 40 hour work week.
‚Ä¢ Great company culture. We‚Äôve been recognized by Texas Monthly, Clutch, Comparably, and more for the quality of our workplace. Feel free to check out our rating on Glassdoor.
‚Ä¢ We‚Äôre here to enable you. It‚Äôs your work and your career. Our management team is here to help you become who you want to be. Not to micromanage you.
‚Ä¢ We value your ideas. At Praxent, our doors are always open. Need help? Come on in. Have a vision for the future of the company? We‚Äôd love to hear it.
‚Ä¢ Rest and relaxation. You‚Äôll get 12 days of paid time off after your first three months; we also observe your country of residence holiday schedule.
‚Ä¢ Professional development. Want to continue your education? Praxent pays for classes, conferences, and more.
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre more than an employee, you‚Äôre a person. Every co-worker you‚Äôll meet is committed to treating you with respect and kindness. You‚Äôll never hear stuff like, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs just business.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Growth Days. A few times per year we take a break from client work and focus on professional development.

If Praxent sounds like the place for you, we‚Äôd love to have you. Write which core value of ours you resonate with most.

Salary range of: $2,750 - $3,500 USD per month

Note: Salary range is subject to location and overall assessment.

#LI-Remote

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
We help the world run better

At SAP, we enable you to bring out your best. Our company culture is focused on collaboration and a shared passion to help the world run better. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.

We‚Äôre looking for a Mobile Developer (Android or iOS) to join our Prague team.

Meet your team

SAP Concur is the world‚Äôs leading provider of integrated travel, expense and invoice management solutions. We imagine the way the world should work, offering cloud-based services that make it simple to manage travel and expenses. By connecting data, applications, and people, Concur delivers an effortless experience and total transparency into spend wherever and whenever it happens. Concur services adapt to individual employee preferences and scale to meet the needs of companies from small to large, so they can focus on what matters most.

Our team in Prague works to integrate the product with some of the largest rail vendors such as Amtrak, SNCF, Renfe, and Deutsche Bahn.

Check out our current mobile apps for iOS and Android at:

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/sap-concur/id335023774

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.concur.breeze&hl=en

As part of the Concur Travel team, you'll help build the next-generation travel-booking experience across our mobile and web apps, ensuring that Concur‚Äôs travel tools meet a high standard of usability and design excellence that supports elegant and simple user experiences.

You will get your hands dirty the whole way, working with cross vertical teams using a Mobile & Cloud-first approach, along with Design Thinking to ensure Concur‚Äôs Reimagined Business Travel experience is the best in the business.

What you¬¥ll do:

You are customer-focused and passionate as we are ‚Äî about travel, designing great software, and having a good time doing it. You are organized, positive, creative, and focused on the user. You know when to make decisions and when to ask questions. You are obsessed with detail and love finding new ways to solve users‚Äô problems. Above all, you love to build terrific products.

Value You Deliver:

What you bring:

‚ÄãBring out your best

SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.

We win with inclusion

SAP‚Äôs culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone ‚Äì regardless of background ‚Äì feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.

SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com

For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.

EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability:

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.

Requisition ID: 411201 | Work Area: Software-Design and Development | Expected Travel: 0 - 10% | Career Status: Professional | Employment Type: Regular Full Time | Additional Locations: #LI-Hybrid.

Job Segment:
Developer, Cloud, Computer Science, ERP, Information Technology, Technology

jobs_results.title: Lead IOS developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Description :
‚Ä¢ Location: Fully remote, EU timezone (CET +/- 2hours)
‚Ä¢ Start date: ASAP
‚Ä¢ Languages: English is mandatory; French is a plus

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Lead the development of new features from technical specifications, and discussions with product and design teams, to monitoring their success.
‚Ä¢ Be passionate about maximizing the impact of the features you work on.
‚Ä¢ Assist your iOS team in continuously improving processes (release, support, etc.) to deliver faster and more effectively.
‚Ä¢ Stay ahead with new iOS & Swift capabilities, experiment with them, and share insights on their application to the app.

Skills Required:
‚Ä¢ Deep understanding of iOS with over 3 years of experience.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, Combine, Async/Await, etc.
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving skills with a solid background in mathematics.
‚Ä¢ Experience in a team of 3+ engineers.
‚Ä¢ Experience with high-traffic applications (millions of monthly active users )
‚Ä¢ Comfortable with remote and asynchronous work settings (status updates, team communication, weekly syncs, Pull Requests, code reviews, etc.).
‚Ä¢ Fluency in English

Nice to Have:
‚Ä¢ Previous experience in video editing is a significant plus.
‚Ä¢ French is a plus
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of AVFoundation, Metal, SpriteKit, CoreGraphics, Vision is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Skills in Computer Vision, Computer Graphics, Machine Learning, AI.
‚Ä¢ Experience in building a cross-platform framework/SDK.

Hiring Process:
‚Ä¢ One technical assessment on iOS (you will be notified via URL)
‚Ä¢ HR interview with our Team
‚Ä¢ Live coding with the end client

jobs_results.description: Ozvƒõte se na aktu√°ln√≠ pracovn√≠ nab√≠dku IOS Developer v lokalitƒõ Praha.

jobs_results.title: Mobile App developer (iOS, Android)
jobs_results.description:
This is an amazing opportunity for Developers to become part of a successful start-up who are now looking to scale up their development team. We are creating a super app marketplace, a Global e-Commerce & Messaging platform and need iOS and Android developers to bring the team up to strength before we launch the app.

√örove≈à
‚Ä¢ Senior
‚Ä¢ Expert

Pozice

Mzda
Navrhni si mzdu

Informace
‚Ä¢ Investors In Ideas Ltd
‚Ä¢ Praha 1

Popis pozice

Project Information

We are currently working on the creation of an international trading platform that provides not only the ability to place ads, but also an expanded set of functions for business users, including a multi-channel sales management system. The functions also include a wallet, a messenger, an affiliate program with remuneration. The project is currently at the prototype stage. Mobile applications that you will work on will have to implement all the functionality provided by our web services.

Duties
‚Ä¢ Develop mobile applications on the Android and iOS platforms.
‚Ä¢ Ensure apps meet Google‚Äôs and Apple‚Äôs guidelines.
‚Ä¢ To offer technological, structural and architectural solutions and implement them.
‚Ä¢ Provide full coverage of all applications with automated tests.
‚Ä¢ Maintain applications, continue to develop and improve applications as new features are added.
‚Ä¢ Interaction with the backend team

Experience required
‚Ä¢ Application development on Android and iOS platforms
‚Ä¢ Work with RESTful interfaces
‚Ä¢ Payment system integration
‚Ä¢ Mobile App Testing

Optional but welcome
‚Ä¢ Web Development Experience
‚Ä¢ Mobile Application Interface Development

Note: The project and aplications are developed in English. We speak English between teams from diferent countries. In the Prague office we speak Czech & English. Do not worry if your English is not perfect, cesky mluvime take.

Jak√© jsou benefity
